title: $1 - DO NOT UPLOAD ILLEGAL CONTENT
text: You are strictly prohibited from uploading content that violates laws applicable in Germany or within the EU.

title: $2 - DO NOT SPAM THIS INSTANCE
text: Testing or spam-heavy use of MASZ is strictly prohibited.

title: $3 - BUG ABUSE
text: Abusing a bug in the MASZ frontend, backend or infrastructure is strictly prohibited.
